headers: SIGN UP FOR GAP EMAILS & GET €​10 OFF when you spend €​60+*​
content.text:
By clicking Submit, you will be receiving marketing emails based upon your email preferences, purchasing history and website browsing. If you have unsubscribed from our marketing emails in the past, by clicking Submit you agree to being resubscribed to receive marketing emails. Your personal data will be collected and handled in accordance with our
     Privacy Policy*Offer valid for first-time registrants only.
Subject to Terms and Conditions.*Offer applies online at www.gap.co.uk and www.gap.eu until 23:59 GMT, seven days from first Welcome email send date; subject to stock availability. One original voucher per transaction; valid for one-time use only. To redeem this offer online, enter the unique code at the checkout. Combinable with site offers. Offer excludes any products indicating "New In!", Always On Essentials, any products involving collaborations with third party designers, Generation Good, cashmere products, leather & suede products, purchases of gift cards and shipping charges. Cannot be combined with any other promotional codes. Gap reserves the right not to apply discount where it suspects fraudulent use. Not valid for cash or cash equivalent. No adjustments on previous purchases. For further information – contact helpline Gap: 0800 368 0674 (from the UK) or 001 614 744 3997 (outside the UK); or email custserv@gap.eu for details. GPS (Great Britain) Limited t/a Gap (Company Number 02275771), Gap Europe Limited (Company Number 6279672) and Gap Stores (Ireland) Limited (Company Number 422253) c/o TMF Corporate Services Limited, 6 St Andrews Street, London, EC4A 3AE© Gap 2018. ​You'll now receive emails from Gap. Check your inbox for your exclusive welcome offer. ​Offer applies at www.gap.eu and www.bananarepublic.eu. For any purchase of €35 or more, delivery of such purchase will be free to an address within our delivery area (for more information see shipping & handling in customer service). Eligible customers must select this option during checkout in order to receive free standard delivery. Offer cannot be combined with any other free or reduced cost delivery offer and applies to shipping charges for initial delivery only. Not valid for cash or cash equivalent. No adjustments on previous purchases. Gap retains the right to update or withdraw this offer at any time. For further information – contact helpline Gap: 0800 368 0674 (from the UK) or 001 614 744 3997 (outside the UK); or email custserv@gap.eu for details. GPS (Great Britain) Limited t/a Gap (Company Number 02275771), Gap Europe Limited (Company Number 6279672) and Gap Stores (Ireland) Limited (Company Number 422253) c/o TMF Corporate Services Limited, 6 St Andrews Street, London, EC4A 3AEIMPORTANT MESSAGE: This site will be closing on 20/7. Enjoy shopping Gap.eu until this date. FIND OUT MORE

Offer applies at www.gap.eu and www.bananarepublic.eu. For any purchase of €35 or more, delivery of such purchase will be free to an address within our delivery area (for more information see shipping & handling in customer service). Eligible customers must select this option during checkout in order to receive free standard delivery. Offer cannot be combined with any other free or reduced cost delivery offer and applies to shipping charges for initial delivery only. Not valid for cash or cash equivalent. No adjustments on previous purchases. Gap retains the right to update or withdraw this offer at any time. For further information – contact helpline Gap: 0800 368 0674 (from the UK) or 001 614 744 3997 (outside the UK); or email custserv@gap.eu for details. GPS (Great Britain) Limited t/a Gap (Company Number 02275771), Gap Europe Limited (Company Number 6279672) and Gap Stores (Ireland) Limited (Company Number 422253) c/o TMF Corporate Services Limited, 6 St Andrews Street, London, EC4A 3AEIMPORTANT MESSAGE: This site will be closing on 20/7. Enjoy shopping Gap.eu until this date. FIND OUT MOREYour browser's Javascript functionality is turned off. Please turn it on so that you can experience the full capabilities of this site.FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS​This gap.eu website is scheduled to close. Please see the following details for further information. When is gap.eu closing?Gap.eu is scheduled to close for trading at 11.59pm GMT on Wednesday 20th July 2022. Up until this time, you can still shop this website as normal. Can I make a return or exchange?Orders made on, or before, Wednesday 20th July, will be subject to Gap’s standard Returns Policy, meaning you have 14 days from receiving your order to post back any unwanted items.Your statutory rights are not affected. You can view the Returns Policy by clicking here.Exchanges are no longer available.As our Distribution Centre is closing, all returns will need to have been posted back to us no later than 9th August 2022.Why can I not return item(s) after 9th August 2022?Both Gap.eu and our Distribution Centre is closing, so we cannot process returns posted back to us after this date. If you have any queries, please contact our customer service team at custserv@gap.eu.What if I have a faulty Gap item?Your statutory rights are not affected. If you have a faulty item, please contact our customer service team at custserv@gap.eu.Where can I shop Gap products once gap.eu has closed?  The last day you can shop on gap.eu will be Wednesday 20th July 2022. After this date, please see the below alternative options on where you can purchase Gap products. Please note that these sites are operated by Gap franchisees whose Terms and Conditions and delivery locations may vary. We suggest you check the relevant site before making a purchase to ensure the Terms and Conditions are acceptable to you.  Franchise partners:CROATIA: gap.com.hr/hr/gapCZECH REPUBLIC: gapstore.cz/GREECE: gap.com.gr/HUNGARY: gap.hu/PORTUGAL: gap.com.pt/SLOVAKIA: gapstore.sk/SLOVENIA: gap.si/sl/gapSPAIN: gap.es/FRANCE: Website coming soonITALY: Website coming soonNext Retail Limited hosted:ROI: www.next.ie/gapWhat will happen to my customer data?Your data will continue to be held by Gap in accordance with the terms of its Privacy Notice, to allow Gap to manage any service queries, returns or recalls for orders placed on gap.eu before 21st July 2022.  For full details of this Privacy Notice, please click here.For customers, who wish to shop on another Gap website owned by one of our franchise partners (see the list above), please note that you will need to sign up to those sites separately. If you are located in the Republic of Ireland, your data will be transferred to Next Retail Limited, and you will be able to shop Gap on the website next.ie/gap. From 21st July 2022, Next Retail Limited will become the data controller of your information. An email communication will be sent to you in advance of the data transfer, and you will have the opportunity to opt out of your data being transferred. If you’d like more detail on what this means for how your data will be processed, please click here.How can I stay informed about Gap?You can follow Gap on various social channels, including Facebook, Instagram, and on Twitter, or sign up for email marketing from a Gap franchise partner (see list above).For any further queries, please contact custserv@gap.eu.Offer applies online at www.gap.co.uk and www.gap.eu until 23:59 GMT, seven days from first Welcome email send date; subject to stock availability. One original voucher per transaction; valid for one-time use only. To redeem this offer online, enter the unique code at the checkout. Combinable with site offers. Offer excludes any products indicating "New In!", Always On Essentials, any products involving collaborations with third party designers, Generation Good, cashmere products, leather & suede products, purchases of gift cards and shipping charges. Cannot be combined with any other promotional codes. Gap reserves the right not to apply discount where it suspects fraudulent use. Not valid for cash or cash equivalent. No adjustments on previous purchases. For further information – contact helpline Gap: 0800 368 0674 (from the UK) or 001 614 744 3997 (outside the UK); or email custserv@gap.eu for details. GPS (Great Britain) Limited t/a Gap (Company Number 02275771), Gap Europe Limited (Company Number 6279672) and Gap Stores (Ireland) Limited (Company Number 422253) c/o TMF Corporate Services Limited, 6 St Andrews Street, London, EC4A 3AE© Gap 2018. © 2022 The Gap, Inc. |

We support MasterCard SecureCode, a security technology that authenticates your MasterCard card and ensures that only the authorized cardholder is placing the order. If the bank that issued your MasterCard supports this service, you may be prompted to enter your password or to sign up for MasterCard SecureCode as you check out. You can also activate your current card now. If you wish to enroll before completing your purchase, please visit the MasterCard website.We support Verified by Visa, a security technology that authenticates your Visa card and ensures that only the authorized cardholder is placing the order. If the bank that issued your Visa supports this service, you may be prompted to enter your password or to sign up for Verified by Visa as you check out. You can also activate your current card now. If you wish to enroll before completing your purchase, please visit the Visa website.

You can also activate your current card now. If you wish to enroll before completing your purchase, please visit the MasterCard website.We support Verified by Visa, a security technology that authenticates your Visa card and ensures that only the authorized cardholder is placing the order. If the bank that issued your Visa supports this service, you may be prompted to enter your password or to sign up for Verified by Visa as you check out. You can also activate your current card now. If you wish to enroll before completing your purchase, please visit the Visa website.
